properties.areaDesc: Galveston Island and Bolivar Peninsula; Matagorda Islands; Brazoria Islands
properties.headline: Rip Current Statement issued March 1 at 9:03AM CST until March 2 at 4:00AM CST by NWS Houston/Galveston TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Rick of strong rip currents along Gulf-facing beaches.

* WHERE...Matagorda Islands, Brazoria Islands, Galveston
Island and Bolivar Peninsula.

* WHEN...Through late tonight.

* IMPACTS...Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away
from shore into deeper water.
properties.instruction:
Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and
float. Don't swim against the current. If able, swim in a
direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the
shore and call or wave for help.

NWSheadline: HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT
